name: PENGUINS CAN FLY (itch)
description:
'Penguins can fly' is a challenging side-scroller arcade game with exploring elementes. In this game, you are a penguin who wants to escape from the boring life he has at the zoo. With the power of sugar and some ablities, our little friend will try to run away and go to the beach of his dreams. 

Will  you help him?
